sentences.english: Jeremy: I'm in my field, the reception here is bad (fuzzy and breaking line).
sentences.chinese: 我在我的地，这里的收线很差。

sentences.english: Wind your line in very carefully or the fish might get away.
sentences.chinese: 小心收线，否则鱼会跑掉。

sentences.english: To clean off the moisture on the surface of the copper rod, a blower is fixed at the end of the guiding pipe.

sentences.english: The taking-up tension is a key factor in manufacturing railway digital signaling cables with internal screen.

sentences.english: Applicable for the multi-line constant speed staggered winding of heavy coil inverted vertical galvanized steel wire.
sentences.chinese: 适用于大盘重镀锌钢丝，多线定速连续梅花收线。

definition: moving average index (used in financial analysis)
many-headed/many-layered (authority)/devolved (as opposed to centralized)/pluralistic/(as classifier) number of animals/long term (finance)/long (investment)
to continue to fall (of share prices)
to shake up/to jolt/to vibrate/to oscillate/to fluctuate
bull market (prices appear to be rising)
to bounce/to bounce back/to boomerang/to ricochet/rebound (of stock market etc)/bounce/backlash/negative repercussions
market price/quotation of market price/the current market situation
